sections.h2:
The planetary engine is the pinnacle of human technology
Yet even it pales in comparison to the challenges ahead

sections.h1: Discover the fate of a fading galaxy
sections.h2:
Many creatures and civilisations still cling to life
You will have to cooperate and compete with them to survive

sections.h1: Manage the resources of entire worlds
sections.h2:
The right materials as well as the right people
are needed to build up the capabilites of the Earth

The custom graphics engine allows for high quality lighting
and capabilites for incredible visual effects

The game is still heavily in development but you can download the alpha build now
There is not yet much of substance to do, but you can explore the test nebula

These are the controls: 
WASD - movement
Shift - boost
Ctrl - momentum speedup
LClick - shoot laser
J - capture asteroid
T - shoot missiles

Freecam controls:
HOME - toggle freecam
WASD - movement
Shift - speedup
R - reset camera
L - lock mouse
P - change perspective mode
F10 - take screenshot(saved in game folder)

An educational game about dinosaurs
Made for the 2018 Bulgarian National Olympiad in Informatics

Learn about the different types of dinosaurs
and the eras they lived in

Test your knowledge in a quiz
and play a game of perception

Interesting facts about dinosaurs are presented
in a fun and interactive way

A game meant to teach the basics of genetics
Made for the 2019 Bulgarian National Olympiad in Informatics

Each one contributes to the animal's appearance
and the way it interacts with the environment

sections.h1: A farmer must also feed his animals
sections.h2:
A plant's genes determine its growth
and the amount of food it provides

Construct fences and feeding troughs
and watch your animals grow

Combine different genes - keep in mind that sometimes they
can mutate and produce unexpected results

Create the most profitable or the healtiest animals - the choice is yours

A game made in 48 hours
Take control of an army of self-destructing robots
and destroy the enemy nuclear arsenal

sections.h1: You need to strategically utilize your robots
sections.h2: Use the explosion as a boost, or to get a weight off of a button

sections.h1: The fate of the world is in your hands
sections.h2:
The enemy is preparing to launch a nuclear strike
You must stop them at all costs
